tr: Tutsak olduğumu fark ettiğimde deliye dönmüş gibiydim. Bulabildiğim her kapıyı deneyip her pencereden dışarı bakarak telaşla merdivenleri inip çıktım; ama kısa süre sonra acizliğime ilişkin inancım diğer her şeyi bastırdı. Birkaç saat sonra geriye dönüp baktığımda, kısa süreliğine aklımı kaçırmış olmam gerektiğini düşünüyorum, çünkü kapana kısılmış bir fare gibi davranıyordum. Fakat biçare olduğum kanısına vardığımda usulca -hayatım boyunca hiç yapmadığım kadar usulca- oturdum ve yapılacak en iyi şeyin ne olduğunu düşünmeye başladım. Hâlâ düşünüyorum ve henüz kesin bir karara varmış değilim. Yalnız tek bir şeyden eminim: Düşüncelerimi Kont’a açıklamanın yararı yok. Buraya hapsedildiğimi gayet iyi biliyor; bunu kendisi gerçekleştirdiği ve kuşkusuz bunun için nedenleri olduğundan ona bu gerçekler konusunda güvenmem durumunda beni ancak kandıracaktır. Şu âna kadar görebildiğim kadarıyla tek planım bildiklerimi ve korkularımı kendime saklayıp gözlerimi dört açmak olacak. Biliyorum ki, ya kendi korkularım tarafından bebek gibi kandırılıyorum ya da müthiş bir darboğaz içindeyim; eğer İkincisi geçerliyse tüm aklıma gereksinimim var ve ileride de gereksinimim olacak.
es: Cuando me di cuenta de que era un prisionero, una especie de sensación salvaje se apoderó de mí. Corrí arriba y abajo por las escaleras, pulsando cada puerta y mirando a través de cada ventana que encontraba; pero después de un rato la convicción de mi impotencia se sobrepuso a todos mis otros sentimientos. Ahora, después de unas horas, cuando pienso en ello me imagino que debo haber estado loco, pues me comporté muy semejante a una rata cogida en una trampa. Sin embargo, cuando tuve la convicción de que era impotente, me senté tranquilamente, tan tranquilamente como jamás lo he hecho en mi vida, y comencé a pensar que era lo mejor que podía hacer. De una cosa sí estoy seguro: que no tiene sentido dar a conocer mis ideas al conde. Él sabe perfectamente que estoy atrapado; y como él mismo es quien lo ha hecho, e indudablemente tiene sus motivos para ello, si le confieso completamente mi situación sólo tratará de engañarme. Por lo que hasta aquí puedo ver, mi único plan será mantener mis conocimientos y mis temores para mí mismo, y mis ojos abiertos. Sé que o estoy siendo engañado como un niño, por mis propios temores, o estoy en un aprieto; y si esto último es lo verdadero, necesito y necesitaré todos mis sesos para poder salir adelante.
vi_translation: Prisoner! When I realized that reality, I thought I was going to go mad. I kept running up and down the stairs, trying to open any door I came across, peeking through every window I passed. After a short while, the feeling of helplessness extinguished all my willpower. After a few hours, honestly, just thinking about being like a rat struggling in a cage made me want to go insane. However, once I understood that struggling was futile, I began to calm down to think and find a way to overcome the situation. But at this moment, my mind could only think aimlessly and couldn't find any solution. I only knew one thing for sure, that it was completely useless to tell the count about my feelings. More than anyone, he knew I was a prisoner here, he wanted it that way, and surely had a reason for it. Therefore, if I confided in him, it was clear he would never admit the truth. So I thought that before clarifying anything, the first thing to do was not to speak about what I had just discovered, not to let him suspect my fears... and always keep a calm demeanor. I understood my situation very clearly at that moment: either I would be a child haunted by fear, or fall into a more difficult situation, and if I accepted that, in the coming days, I would need, very much need, a clear mind.
tr_translation: I was almost out of my mind when I realized I was a prisoner. I frantically tried every door I could find and looked out of every window, running up and down the stairs; but soon my belief in my helplessness overshadowed everything else. Looking back a few hours later, I think I must have lost my mind for a short time, because I was acting like a trapped rat. But when I concluded that I was helpless, I sat down quietly -more quietly than I had ever done in my life- and began to think about what the best course of action would be. I am still thinking and have not yet come to a definite decision. I am sure of only one thing: There is no point in explaining my thoughts to the Count. He knows very well that I am imprisoned here; since he is the one who did it and undoubtedly has his reasons for it, if I trust him with these facts, he will only deceive me. As far as I can see, my only plan is to keep what I know and fear to myself and stay alert. I know that either I am being fooled like a baby by my own fears, or I am in a terrible predicament; if it is the latter, I need all my wits and will need them in the future as well.
es_translation: When I realized that I was a prisoner, a sort of wild sensation took hold of me. I ran up and down the stairs, pressing every door and looking through every window I found; but after a while, the conviction of my helplessness overcame all my other feelings. Now, after a few hours, when I think about it, I imagine that I must have been mad, for I behaved very much like a rat caught in a trap. However, when I was convinced of my helplessness, I sat quietly, as quietly as I have ever done in my life, and began to think about what was the best thing I could do. One thing I am sure of: it makes no sense to reveal my ideas to the Count. He knows perfectly well that I am trapped; and since he himself is the one who has done it, and undoubtedly has his reasons for it, if I fully confess my situation to him, he will only try to deceive me. From what I can see so far, my only plan will be to keep my knowledge and fears to myself, and my eyes open. I know that either I am being deceived like a child by my own fears, or I am in a predicament; and if the latter is true, I need and will need all my wits to get through.
st: Ha ke fumana hore ke ne ke le motšoaruoa oa mofuta o mong oa maikutlo a hlaha a ile a feta holim'a ka. Ke ile ka potlakela ho theosa le litepisi, ke leka monyako o mong le o mong ebe ke tsoa ka fensetere e 'ngoe le e' ngoe eo nka e fumanang; Empa ka mor'a ho se ts'oenyehe ka ho hloka thuso ea ka e ile ea hlōla maikutlo a mang kaofela. Ha ke hetla morao ka mor'a lihora tse 'maloa ke nahana hore ke tlameha ebe ke hlanya ka nako eo, hobane ke ne ke itšoere joalo ka ha rat e etsa lerabeng. ʻO ka hoʻokuʻi ʻia no ka hoʻohaʻi ʻia no ka ʻaʻae ʻae ʻia e like me ka hoʻohaʻi ʻia e like me ka hoʻolima. Ke ntse ke nahana, 'me ha ke e-s'o fihle qeto e hlakileng. Ke nahana hore ho na le ntho e le 'ngoe feela eo ke e tsebang; Hore ha ho na mokhoa o mong oa ho etsa hore maikutlo a ka a be a tsebe melao ea ka. O tseba hantle hore ke teronkong; 'Me feela joalokaha a entse ka boeena o, 'me o belaela mabaka a hae bakeng sa eona, o ne a tla nthetsa feela haeba ke mo tšepa ka lintlha. Ho ea kamoo nka bonang, morero oa ka feela e tla ba ho boloka tsebo ea ka le tšabo ea ka ho 'na, le mahlo a ka a buleha. Ke 'na, kea tseba, ebang ke ntse ke thetsoa, joaloka lesea, ke tšabo ea ka, kapa ho seng joalo ke ka straits desperate; 'Me haeba ea morao-rao e le joalo ke hloka, 'me ke tla hloka, boko bohle ba ka ho feta.
yo: Nígbà tí mo rí i pé mo jẹ́ ẹlẹ́wọ̀n irú ìmọ̀lára burúkú wá sórí mi. Mo sáré sókè àti sọ̀kalẹ̀ àtẹ̀gùn, mo ń gbìyànjú gbogbo ìlẹ̀kùn mo sì ń wo gbogbo fèrèsé tí mo lè rí; Ṣùgbọ́n lẹ́yìn díẹ̀ ìdájọ́ àìbìkítà mi borí gbogbo ìmọ̀lára mìíràn. Nígbà tí mo bá wo ẹ̀yìn lẹ́yìn wákàtí díẹ̀ mo rò pé mo gbọ́dọ̀ ti bínú fún àkókò náà, nítorí mo hùwà bí eku ṣe ń ṣe nínú ìdẹkùn. Nígbà tí, síbẹ̀síbẹ̀, ìdájọ́ náà ti wá sọ́dọ̀ mi pé mi ò ní ìrànlọ́wọ́ mo jókòó ní ìdákẹ́jẹ́ẹ́ - ní ìdákẹ́jẹ́ bí mo ti ṣe ohunkóhun rí láyé mi - mo sì bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí ní ronú lórí ohun tí ó dára jù láti ṣe. Mò ń ronú síbẹ̀, àti pé síbẹ̀síbẹ̀ mi ò tíì wá sí ìparí tó dájú. Ti ohun kan nikan ni idaniloju mi; Pé kì í ṣe lílò mímú àwọn èrò mi di mímọ̀ fún Òǹkà. Ó mọ̀ dáadáa pé wọ́n fi mí sẹ́wọ̀n; àti pé bí ó ti ṣe é fúnra rẹ̀, tí ó sì ti ṣe ìyèméjì ìdí tirẹ̀ fún un, yóò tàn mí jẹ bí mo bá gbẹ́kẹ̀lé rẹ̀ ní kíkún pẹ̀lú òtítọ́. Níwọ̀n ìgbà tí mo bá rí i, ètò mi kan ṣoṣo ni láti pa ìmọ̀ mi mọ́ àti ìbẹ̀rù mi sí ara mi, ojú mi sì ṣí sílẹ̀. Èmi ni, mo mọ̀, yálà kí wọ́n tàn mí jẹ, bí ọmọdé, nípa ìbẹ̀rù tèmi, bí bẹ́ẹ̀ kọ́ mo wà nínú ìṣòro ìjákulẹ̀; Bí ìgbẹ̀yìn bá sì rí bẹ́ẹ̀, mo nílò, àti pé mo máa nílò, gbogbo ọpọlọ mi láti la ara mi kọjá.
tn: Fa ke ne ke lemoga gore ke ne ke le mogolegwa mongwe yo o neng a ikutlwa ka tsela e e sa tshwaneng le e e sa ntseng e ntshwenya. Ke ne ka itlhaganela le fa tlase ga ditepisi, ka leka kgoro nngwe le nngwe e e tswang mo fensetereng nngwe le nngwe e ke neng ke e bona. Le fa go ntse jalo, morago ga moo, ke ne ka ikutlwa ke sa kgone go dira dilo tse dingwe tse di sa siamang. Fa ke lebelela morago ga diura di le mmalwa ke akanya gore ke tshwanetse gore ke ne ke le bogale ka gonne ke ne ke itshwara fela jaaka lesoba. Fa ke ne ke le mo dingwageng tse di fetileng, ke ne ka simolola go akanya gore ke ne ke sa kgone go dira dilo ka tsela e e itumedisang e bile ke ne ka simolola go akanya ka se se molemo go gaisa se ke neng ke se dira. Ke sa ntse ke akanya mme ga ke ise ke akanye gore ga ke ise ke akanye ka gope. 8Ke na le bonnete jwa kgang e le nngwe fela; Ga go na mosola wa go dira gore ke itse se ke se dirang gore ke nne le seabe mo go ba bangwe. O ne a itse gore ke mo kgolegelong. Fela jaaka a dirile jalo ka boene, mme a belaela gore o tla mpolaya fela fa ke mo ikanya ka dilo tse a di dirileng. 18Ka moo ke bonang, ke tla boloka kitso ya me le poifo ya me mo go nna, le matlho a me a bulegile. Ke a itse gore, gongwe ke tsiediwa jaaka losea, ka poifo ya me, go seng jalo ke le mo meetsing e e sa fetogeng. Mme fa e le gore go ntse jalo, ke tla tlhoka, mme ke tla tshwanelwa ke go nna le sengwe le sengwe se ke se tlhokang.
ty: I TO ' U iteraa e e mau auri au, ua tupu maira te hoê mana'o taehae i nia ia ' u. Ua horo vau i ni'a e i raro i te e'a, ma te tamata i te mau uputa atoa e ma te hi'o na roto i te mau haamaramarama atoa e itehia ia'u ; i muri a'e râ i te tahi maa taime iti, ua upooti'a to'u mana'o i ni'a i te tahi atu mau mana'o. Ia hi'o ana'e au i muri tau hora i muri, e mana'o vau e ua riri paha vau no taua taime ra, no te mea e haerea to ' u mai te hoê iore i roto i te hoê marei. Tera râ, i te taime a tupu mai ai te mana'o papû i roto ia'u e, aita e rave'a faahou, ua parahi hau noa vau—ma te maniania ore mai ta'u i rave i roto i to'u oraraa—e ua haamata vau i te feruri i te mea maitai a'e ia rave. Te feruri noa nei â vau, e aitâ vau i ite atura i te hoê noa ' ' e faaotiraa papu. Hoê noa mea ta'u e ti'aturi nei ; aita e faufaa ia faaite atu i to'u mau mana'o. Ua ite maitai oia e, ua tape'ahia vau i te fare auri ; e mai ta'na iho i rave, e e mea papû roa e, na'na iho i faatupu i te reira, e haavare noa oia ia'u mai te mea e, e ti'aturi hope roa vau ia'na no ni'a i te mau ohipa i tupu. Mai ta'u e nehenehe e ite, ta'u noa opuaraa o te tape'araa ïa i to'u ite e to'u mau mata'u ia'u iho, e ia araara to'u mau mata. Ua ite au e, ua haavarehia vau, mai te hoê aiû, na roto i to'u iho mau mata'u, e aore râ, ia ore ana'e, tei roto ïa vau i te ati; e mai te mea o te reira ihoa, e hinaaro ïa vau, e e titau ïa vau i te taatoaraa o to'u mau feruriraa ia haere atu i roto.
mai: जखन हमरा पता चलल जे हम कैदी छी तखन हमरा पर एकटा तरहक जंगली भावना आबि गेल। हम सीढ़ी पर चढ़ल-उतरैत दौड़लहुं, हर दरवाजा के कोशिश केलहुं आ हर खिड़की सं बाहर झांकि रहल छलहुं जे हमरा भेटैत छल। मुदा कने बाद हमर लाचारीक दृढ़ विश्वास आन सभ भावना पर हावी भए गेल। किछु घंटाक बाद जखन हम पाछू मुड़ि देखैत छी तखन हमरा लगैत अछि जे हम ओहि समयक लेल पागल भऽ गेल होयब, किएक तँ हम ओतेक व्यवहार कयलहुँ जेना एकटा चूहा जालमे पड़ैत अछि। यद्यपि, जखन हमरा ई विश्वास आबि गेल छल जे हम असहाय छी तखन हम चुपचाप बैसि गेलहुँ - ओतेक चुपचाप जेना हम अपन जीवनमे कहियो किछु कयलहुँ अछि - आ सोचय लगलहुँ जे की करब सबसँ नीक अछि। हम एखनहु सोचि रहल छी, आ एखन धरि कोनो निश्चित निष्कर्ष पर नहि पहुँचल छी। केवल एकटा बात के हम निश्चित छी; कि हमर विचार के गिनती के जनतब देबए मे कोनो फायदा नहि अछि। ओ नीक जकाँ जनैत छथि जे हम कैद छी। आ जेना ओ स्वयं कयने छथि, आ निस्सन्देह एकर अपन उद्देश्य रखैत छथि, ओ हमरा तखन धोखा देताह जखन हम तथ्यक संग हुनका पर पूरा भरोसा करब। जतय धरि हम देखि सकैत छी, हमर एकमात्र योजना ई होयत जे हम अपन ज्ञान आ अपन भयकेँ अपना लग राखब, आ अपन आँखि खुजल राखब। हम जनैत छी, या तँ बच्चा जकाँ, अपन भयसँ धोखा देल जा रहल छी, नहि तँ हम हताश संकटमे छी; आ जँ बादवला एहन अछि तखन हमरा अपन सभटा दिमागक आवश्यकता अछि आ जरूरत पड़त।
mg: TSAPAKO hoe tena ratsy fanahy aho, rehefa hitako hoe gadra aho. Nihazakazaka niakatra sy nidina ny tohatra aho, nanandrana ny varavarana rehetra ary nijery avy teo amin'ny varavarankely rehetra izay hitako; Saingy taorian'ny fotoana fohy dia nandresy ny fihetseham-po hafa rehetra ny faharesen-dahatra momba ny tsy fahampiako aho. Rehefa manao jery todika ora vitsivitsy aho dia mieritreritra fa tsy maintsy ho tezitra nandritra izany fotoana izany, satria nitondra tena tahaka ny ataon'ny voalavo amin'ny fandrika aho. Rehefa tonga tamiko anefa ny faharesen-dahatra fa tsy afa-manoatra aho dia nipetraka tamim-pahanginana—tamim-pahanginana toy ny efa nataoko teo amin'ny fiainako—ary nanomboka nieritreritra ny zavatra tsara tokony hatao. Mbola mieritreritra ihany aho, ary mbola tsy tonga amin'ny tsoa-kevitra mazava. Zavatra iray ihany no azoko antoka; Tsy ilaina ny mampahafantatra ny hevitro amin'ny Count. Fantany tsara fa any am-ponja aho; ary araka izay efa nataony ihany, ary azo antoka fa ny antony manosika azy manokana ho amin'izany, dia tsy hamitaka ahy afa-tsy raha matoky azy tanteraka amin'ny zava-misy. Raha ny fahitako azy, ny hany drafitro dia ny hitazona ny fahalalako sy ny tahotro ho an'ny tenako, ary ny masoko hisokatra. Fantatro fa na voafitaka aho, tahaka ny zazakely, noho ny tahotro ihany, na raha tsy izany dia ao anatin'ny fahoriana mafy aho; ary raha toa ka izany no izy, dia mila aho ary mila ny atidohako rehetra mba ho tafavoaka amin'izany.

en: “I desire it much; nay, I will take no refusal. When your master, employer, what you will, engaged that someone should come on his behalf, it was understood that my needs only were to be consulted. I have not stinted. Is it not so?”
vi: — Đúng, tôi muốn thế và tôi sẽ không chấp nhận bất cứ lời từ chối nào. Khi ông thầy, ông chủ của ngài gửi cho tôi một người nào đó nhân danh ông ta, ông đã đồng ý để tôi được sử dụng người đó tùy thích cho công việc của tôi... Đừng từ chối? Ngài đồng ý chứ?
vi_results: "title": "Book name: The Count of Monte Cristo", "author": "Alexandre Dumas"
tr: “Çok istiyorum; yok, itiraz kabul etmiyorum. Efendiniz, işvereniniz, artık nasıl adlandırıyorsanız, onun yerine birinin gelmesine karar verdiğinde yalnız benim gereksinimlerimin dikkate alınacağı anlaşılıyordu. Masraftan kaçınmadım. Öyle değil mi?
es: –Lo deseo mucho; no, más bien, no acepto negativas. Cuando su señor, su patrón, como usted quiera, encargó que alguien viniese en su nombre, se entendió que solo debían consultarse mis necesidades. Yo no he escatimado, ¿no es así?
es_results: "title": "Don Quijote de la Mancha", "author": "Miguel de Cervantes"
vi_translation: — Yes, I want that and I will not accept any refusal. When your master, your boss, sent me someone in his name, he agreed that I could use that person as I see fit for my work... Don't refuse? Do you agree?
tr_translation: “I want it very much; no, I do not accept objections. Your master, your employer, however you call him, it was understood that only my needs would be considered when someone was decided to replace him. I did not spare any expense. Isn't that so?”
es_translation: –I desire it greatly; no, rather, I do not accept refusals. When your master, your employer, whatever you prefer, ordered someone to come on his behalf, it was understood that only my needs should be consulted. I have not been stingy, have I?
st: Ke e lakatsa haholo; Hahaha, i'll take no hana. Ha mong'a hau, mong'a hau, mohiri, seo u tla se etsa, o kenella hore motho e mong o lokela ho tla molemong oa hae, ho ne ho utloisisoa hore litlhoko tsa ka li tla botsoa feela. Ha ke a ka ka singa. Ha ho jwalo?"
yo: "Mo fẹ pupọ; Rárá, mi ò ní gba ìkọ̀sílẹ̀ kankan. Nígbà tí ọ̀gá rẹ, agbanisíṣẹ́, ohun tí o máa ṣe, bá sọ̀rọ̀ pé ẹnìkan gbọ́dọ̀ wá ní orúkọ rẹ̀, a mọ̀ pé àwọn ohun tí mo nílò nìkan ni wọ́n gbọ́dọ̀ kàn sí. Mi ò tí ì ṣiṣẹ́. Ṣé bẹ́ẹ̀ kọ́?"

en: “I trust you will forgive me, but I have much work to do in private this evening. You will, I hope, find all things as you wish.” At the door he turned, and after a moment’s pause said:—
vi: — Hy vọng là ngài sẽ thứ lỗi cho tôi, tối nay tôi lại có việc bận. Ngài sẽ tìm thấy ở đây tất cả những gì ngài cần, tôi nói vậy có phải không ạ? Ra đến cửa, lão dừng lại một lúc rồi ngoảnh lại:
tr: “Beni bağışlayacağınıza inanıyorum, ama bu akşam yalnız yapmam gereken çok iş var. Umarım, her şeyi dilediğiniz gibi bulursunuz.” Kapıda arkasına döndü ve bir anlık duraksamadan sonra şunu ekledi:
es: –Confío en que usted me perdonará, pero tengo mucho trabajo en privado que hacer esta noche. Espero que usted encuentre todas las cosas que necesita. Ya en la puerta se volvió, y después de un momento de pausa, dijo:
vi_translation: — I hope you will forgive me, I have another engagement tonight. You will find everything you need here, won't you? Reaching the door, he paused for a moment and then turned back:
tr_translation: “I believe you will forgive me, but I have a lot of work to do alone tonight. I hope you find everything as you wish.” He turned at the door and after a moment's hesitation, he added:
es_translation: –I trust you will forgive me, but I have a lot of private work to do tonight. I hope you find everything you need. Already at the door, he turned around, and after a moment of pause, he said:
st: Ke ts'epa hore o tla ntšoarela, empa ke na le mosebetsi o mongata oa ho etsa boinotšing mantsiboeeng ana. Ke tšepa hore u tla fumana ntho e 'ngoe le e' ngoe ka tsela eo u batlang. " Ka mor'a ho qeta nako, o ile a re, "O ile a re ho eena, o ile a re: "
yo: "Mo gbẹkẹle pe iwọ yoo dariji mi, ṣugbọn Mo ni iṣẹ pupọ lati ṣe ni ikọkọ ni aṣalẹ yii. Iwọ yoo, Mo nireti, wa ohun gbogbo bi o ti fẹ. " Ní ìlẹ̀kùn ó yí padà, lẹ́yìn ìdádúró ìṣẹ́jú kan sọ pé: -

ty: " Te ti'aturi nei au e, e faaore mai oe i ta'u hapa, tera râ, e ohipa rahi ta'u e rave i te vahi mo'emo'e i teie pô. Te ti'aturi nei au e, e itehia ia oe te mau mea atoa mai ta oe e hinaaro ". I te pae uputa ua fariu oia, e i muri a'e i te hoê taime faafaaearaa, ua parau maira oia e:—

en: When he left me I went to my room. After a little while, not hearing any sound, I came out and went up the stone stair to where I could look out towards the South. There was some sense of freedom in the vast expanse, inaccessible though it was to me, as compared with the narrow darkness of the courtyard. Looking out on this, I felt that I was indeed in prison, and I seemed to want a breath of fresh air, though it were of the night. I am beginning to feel this nocturnal existence tell on me. It is destroying my nerve. I start at my own shadow, and am full of all sorts of horrible imaginings. God knows that there is ground for my terrible fear in this accursed place! I looked out over the beautiful expanse, bathed in soft yellow moonlight till it was almost as light as day. In the soft light the distant hills became melted, and the shadows in the valleys and gorges of velvety blackness. The mere beauty seemed to cheer me; there was peace and comfort in every breath I drew. As I leaned from the window my eye was caught by something moving a storey below me, and somewhat to my left, where I imagined, from the order of the rooms, that the windows of the Count’s own room would look out. The window at which I stood was tall and deep, stone-mullioned, and though weatherworn, was still complete; but it was evidently many a day since the case had been there. I drew back behind the stonework, and looked carefully out.
vi: Bá tước vừa đi khỏi, tôi cũng về luôn phòng mình. Một lúc lâu sau, khi không còn nghe thấy bất cứ một tiếng động nào, tôi mới lặng lẽ ra hành lang tìm đến nơi có ô cửa sổ nhìn về phía nam. Trái ngược với cái khoảng chật hẹp, tối tăm và tù túng ở sân lâu đài, cái không gian mênh mông xa hút tầm mắt bên ngoài đã cho tôi một chút cảm giác của bầu trời tự do. Không gì bằng được hít thở bầu không khí mát lành lúc này, cho dù bây giờ vẫn đang là buổi đêm. Đang mải ngắm cảnh, tôi bỗng giật thót người khi bất giác nhận ra cái bóng của chính mình, và thế là mọi ý nghĩ quái đản và khủng khiếp nhất lại ập đến trong đầu tôi. Đúng là chỉ có Chúa mới biết nỗi lo sợ của tôi không phải là vô căn cứ? Tôi cố bình tĩnh, ngắm phong cảnh đang trải rộng trước mắt, dưới ánh trăng tỏ như ban ngày. Dưới ánh trăng bàng bạc, những ngọn đồi trùng điệp xa xa như hòa lẫn với các thung lũng, khe núi, tạo thành một màu đen mượt như nhung. Vẻ đẹp giản dị ấy giúp tôi bình tĩnh lại và mỗi làn gió mát lạnh dường như cũng mang đến cho tôi sự bình yên và một chút vỗ về, an ủi. Nhoài người ra cửa sổ nhìn xuống chân lâu đài, tôi tình cờ phát hiện thấy có một cái gì đó đang động đậy ở tầng dưới, hơi chếch một chút về bên trái. Qua những gì tôi biết về vị trí sắp xếp các phòng, thì hình như phòng ở của bá tước nằm đúng ở chỗ đó. Cửa sổ nơi tôi đang cúi nhìn xuống nằm ở một vị trí rất cao, khuôn cửa sâu, và các bậu cửa đều được xây bằng đá, nên dù có bị hư hỏng theo năm tháng, cũng chẳng có gì đặc biệt đáng chú ý. Tôi đứng thẳng người dậy để khỏi bị phát hiện, nhưng vẫn không quên theo dõi những gì đang diễn ra ở phía dưới.
tr: Kont yanımdan ayrıldığında odama gittim. Kısa süre sonra, hiç ses duymayınca dışarı çıktım ve güneye bakabileceğim taş merdivenleri tırmandım. Avlunun dar karanlığına kıyasla, her ne kadar ulaşılmaz olsa da, gördüğüm geniş alanda bir tür özgürlük hissi vardı. Manzaraya bakınca gerçekten de hapishanede tutulduğumu hissettim ve gece havası olmasına karşın bir nefes temiz hava almak istiyor gibiydim. Geceye özgü bu yaşam biçiminin beni kötü etkilediğini hissetmeye başladım. Sinirlerimi bozuyor. Kendi gölgemden korkuyorum ve zihnim türlü türlü korkunç imgelemle dolu. Tanrı biliyor ki, bu lanetli yerde her türlü dehşet verici korkuya uygun zemin var! Neredeyse gün gibi aydınlık olana dek yumuşak, sarı ay ışığında yıkanan güzelim enginliğe baktım. Yumuşak ışığın altında uzaktaki tepeler, vadilerin gölgeleri ve kadifemsi siyah geçitler eridi. Bu yalın güzellik beni neşelendirmiş gibiydi; aldığım her nefeste huzur ve rahatlık vardı. Pencereden eğildiğimde gözüme, bir kat aşağıda, biraz solumda, odaların dizilişine göre Kont’un kendi odasının pencerelerinin bakacağını farz ettiğim yerde hareket eden bir şey takıldı. Benim durduğum pencere yüksek, derin ve taş tirizliydi ve hava koşulları nedeniyle yıpranmış olsa da hâlâ mükemmel durumdaydı; fakat pencere kasasının uzun zamandır burada olduğu çok belliydi. Taş işinin arkasına çekildim ve dikkatle dışarı baktım.
es: Cuando me dejó, yo me dirigí a mi cuarto. Después de cierto tiempo, al no escuchar ningún ruido, salí y subí al graderío de piedras desde donde podía ver hacia el sur. Había cierto sentido de la libertad en esta vasta extensión, aunque me fuese inaccesible, comparada con la estrecha oscuridad del patio interior. Al mirar hacia afuera, sentí sin ninguna duda que estaba prisionero, y me pareció que necesitaba un respiro de aire fresco, aunque fuese en la noche. Estoy comenzando a sentir que esta existencia nocturna me está afectando. Me está destruyendo mis nervios. Me asusto de mi propia sombra, y estoy lleno de toda clase de terribles imaginaciones. ¡Dios sabe muy bien que hay motivos para mi terrible miedo en este maldito lugar! Miré el bello paisaje, bañado en la tenue luz amarilla de la luna, hasta que casi era como la luz del día. En la suave penumbra las colinas distantes se derretían, y las sombras se perdían en los valles y hondonadas de un negro aterciopelado. La mera belleza pareció alegrarme; había paz y consuelo en cada respiración que inhalaba. Al reclinarme sobre la ventana mi ojo fue captado por algo que se movía un piso más abajo y algo hacia mi izquierda, donde imagino, por el orden de las habitaciones, que estarían las ventanas del cuarto del propio conde. La ventana en la cual yo me encontraba era alta y profunda, cavada en piedra, y aunque el tiempo y el clima la habían gastado, todavía estaba completa. Pero evidentemente hacía mucho que el marco había desaparecido. Me coloqué detrás del cuadro de piedras y miré atentamente.
vi_translation: The Count had just left, and I returned to my room immediately. A long while later, when I could no longer hear any sound, I quietly went out to the hallway to find the window facing south. In contrast to the narrow, dark, and confined space of the castle courtyard, the vast, far-reaching space outside gave me a slight sense of the free sky. Nothing compares to breathing in the fresh air at this moment, even though it was still nighttime. While engrossed in the scenery, I suddenly jolted when I inadvertently noticed my own shadow, and thus the most bizarre and terrifying thoughts flooded my mind. Indeed, only God knows that my fears are not unfounded? I tried to calm myself, gazing at the scenery spreading out before me, under the bright moonlight as if it were daytime. Under the pale moonlight, the distant rolling hills seemed to blend with the valleys and ravines, forming a smooth, velvet-like black color. That simple beauty helped me calm down, and each cool breeze seemed to bring me peace and a bit of comfort and solace. Leaning out the window to look down at the foot of the castle, I accidentally discovered something moving on the lower floor, slightly to the left. From what I knew about the arrangement of the rooms, it seemed that the Count's quarters were right there. The window where I was leaning out was in a very high position, the frame deep, and the sills were all made of stone, so even if they were damaged over the years, there was nothing particularly noteworthy. I stood up straight to avoid being detected, but I did not forget to keep an eye on what was happening below.
tr_translation: When the Count left my side, I went to my room. Shortly after, not hearing any sound, I went outside and climbed the stone stairs from which I could look south. Compared to the narrow darkness of the courtyard, there was a sense of freedom in the vast area I saw, even though it was unattainable. Looking at the view, I truly felt that I was being held in a prison, and despite it being night, I seemed to want to take a breath of fresh air. I began to feel that this nocturnal way of life was affecting me badly. It's getting on my nerves. I'm afraid of my own shadow, and my mind is filled with all sorts of terrifying imaginations. God knows, there is ample ground for every kind of horrifying fear in this cursed place! I looked at the beautiful expanse bathed in the soft, yellow moonlight until it was almost as bright as day. Under the soft light, the distant hills, the shadows of the valleys, and the velvety black passes melted away. This simple beauty seemed to have cheered me up; there was peace and comfort in every breath I took. When I leaned out of the window, something moving caught my eye, a floor below, slightly to my left, in the place where I assumed the windows of the Count's own room would be, according to the arrangement of the rooms. The window I stood at was high, deep, and stone-latticed, and although it was weather-worn, it was still in perfect condition; but it was very clear that the window frame had been here for a long time. I pulled back behind the stonework and looked out carefully.
es_translation: When he left me, I headed to my room. After some time, not hearing any noise, I went out and climbed the stone bleachers from where I could see to the south. There was a certain sense of freedom in this vast expanse, although it was inaccessible to me, compared to the narrow darkness of the inner courtyard. Looking outside, I felt without any doubt that I was a prisoner, and it seemed to me that I needed a breath of fresh air, even if it was at night. I am beginning to feel that this nocturnal existence is affecting me. It is destroying my nerves. I am scared of my own shadow, and I am filled with all kinds of terrible imaginations. God knows very well that there are reasons for my terrible fear in this damned place! I looked at the beautiful landscape, bathed in the faint yellow light of the moon, until it was almost like daylight. In the soft twilight, the distant hills melted away, and the shadows were lost in the valleys and hollows of a velvety black. The mere beauty seemed to cheer me up; there was peace and comfort in every breath I inhaled. As I leaned against the window, my eye was caught by something moving a floor below and somewhat to my left, where I imagine, by the order of the rooms, the windows of the count's own room would be. The window in which I was standing was high and deep, carved in stone, and although time and weather had worn it, it was still complete. But evidently, the frame had long since disappeared. I placed myself behind the stone frame and looked intently.
st: Ha ke mo siea, ke ile ka kena ka kamoreng ea ka. Kamora nakoana, ha ke utloe molumo leha e le ofe, ka tsoa 'me ka nyolohela litepising tsa majoe moo ke neng ke ka sheba ka nģ'a boroa. Ho ne ho e-na le kutloisiso ea tokoloho e kholo, e sa bonahaleng, leha e ne e le ho nna, ha e bapisoa le lefifi le patisaneng la lebala. Ha ke sheba sena, ke ile ka ikutloa eka ke le teronkong, 'me ke ne ke batla moea o hloekileng, leha e ne e le oa bosiu. Ke qala ho utloa hore na ho na le motho ea sa tšepahaleng ho bua ka 'na. E senya methapo ea ka. Ke qala ka moriti oa ka, 'me ke tletse mefuta eohle e tšabehang. Molimo oa tseba hore ho na le lefatše bakeng sa tšabo ea ka e tšabehang sebakeng sena se rohakiloeng. Ke ile ka sheba holim'a expanse e ntle, e hlatsoe ka khanya e bonolo ea khoeli e mosehla ho fihlela e batla e le khanya joaloka letsatsi. Ka leseli le bonolo maralla a hōle a ile a qhibiliha, 'me meriti e phuleng le gorges ea botšo ba velvety. ʻO ka ʻae ʻana a me ka hoʻopiʻi; Ho ne ho e-na le khotso le matšeliso phefumoloho e 'ngoe le e' ngoe eo ke e fumaneng. Ha ke ntse ke its'etleha fensetereng leihlo la ka le ile la ts'oaroa ke ntho e tsamaeang ka tlase ho nna, mme ke batla ho le letšehali, moo ke neng ke nahana, ho tloha ka tatellano ea likamore, hore lifensetere tsa phaposi ea Count li ne li tla shebahala. Fensetere eo ke neng ke eme ho eona e ne e le boreleli ebile e tebile, e tletse majoe, leha weatherworn, e ne e ntse e phethehile; Leha ho le joalo, ho ne ho bonahala eka ho ne ho e-na le letsatsi le le leng ho tloha ha nyeoe e ntse e le teng. Ke ile ka ea ka mor'a mosebetsi oa majoe mme ka sheba ka hloko.
yo: Nígbà tó fi mí sílẹ̀ mo lọ sínú yàrá mi. Lẹ́yìn ìgbà díẹ̀, mi ò gbọ́ ohùn kankan, mo jáde mo sì gòkè lọ sí àtẹ̀gùn òkúta lọ sí ibi tí mo ti lè wo Gúúsù. Ìmọ̀lára òmìnira kan wà nínú ààyè ńlá náà, tí kò ṣe é wọlé bí ó tilẹ̀ jẹ́ pé ó jẹ́ fún mi, gẹ́gẹ́ bí a ṣe fi wé òkùnkùn àgbàlá tó tóbi. Nígbà tí mo ń wo èyí, mo rò pé mo wà lẹ́wọ̀n lóòótọ́, ó sì dàbí ẹni pé mo fẹ́ èémí afẹ́fẹ́ tuntun, bí ó tilẹ̀ jẹ́ pé alẹ́ ni. Mo ti bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí ní ní ìmọ̀lára ìwàláàyè alẹ́ yìí sọ fún mi. Ó ń ba iṣan mi jẹ́. Mo bẹ̀rẹ̀ pẹ̀lú òjìji tèmi, mo sì kún fún oríṣiríṣi ìrònú burúkú. Ọlọ́run mọ̀ pé ilẹ̀ wà fún ìbẹ̀rù burúkú mi ní ibi tí wọ́n ti kó jọ yìí! Mo wo ìta lórí ṣòkòtò tó rẹwà náà, mo wẹ̀ nínú ìmọ́lẹ̀ òféèfé tó rọ̀ títí tí ó fi fẹ́rẹ̀ẹ́ fúyẹ́ bí ọjọ́. Nínú ìmọ́lẹ̀ tó rọ̀ àwọn òkè jíjìn náà yọ́, àwọn òjìji ní àfonífojì àti àwọn àfonífojì àti àwọn àfonífojì dúdú velvety. Ẹwà lásán náà dàbí ẹni pé ó ń yọ̀ fún mi; Àlàáfíà àti ìtùnú wà ní gbogbo èémí tí mo yà. Bí mo ṣe tẹríba láti inú fèrèsé nkan tí ó ń gbé àjà kan sí ìsàlẹ̀ mi mú ojú mi, àti díẹ̀ sí apá òsì mi, níbi tí mo ti fojú inú wò ó, láti àṣẹ àwọn yàrá náà, pé àwọn fèrèsé yàrá Count fúnra rẹ̀ yóò wo ìta. Fèrèsé tí mo dúró sí ga ó sì jinlẹ̀, òkúta-mullioned, àti pé bí ó tilẹ̀ jẹ́ pé ojú ọjọ́ búra, ṣì pé; ṣùgbọ́n ó hàn gbangba pé ọjọ́ púpọ̀ ni láti ìgbà tí ẹjọ́ náà ti wà níbẹ̀. Mo padà sẹ́yìn iṣẹ́ òkúta náà, mo sì wò ó dáadáa.
tn: Fa ke mo tlogela, ke ne ka ya kwa phaposing ya me. Morago ga lobakanyana, ke sa utlwe lentswe lepe, ka tswa ka ya kwa godimo, ka tlhatlogela kwa ke neng ke lebile kwa borwa. Go ne go na le sengwe se se neng sa dira gore ke nne le kgololesego e kgolo e e neng e le teng, le fa e ne e le nna, fa e bapisiwa le lefifi le le pitlaganyeng la lefatshe. Ke ne ka lemoga gore ke ne ke le mo kgolegelong, mme ke ne ke batla go hema moya o o phepa, le fa e le bosigo. Ke ne ka simolola go lemoga gore go na le dilo tse di bosula tse di nkgatlhang. E senya pelo ya me. Ke ne ka simolola go itlhamela, mme ke na le dilo tse di bosula tse di sa tshwaneng. "Modimo o a itse gore go na le lefatshe le le boitshegang ka ntlha ya poifo ya me e e boitshegang mo lefelong leno le le hutsitsweng." Ke ne ka leba kwa ntle ga disini tse di monate, ka fitlhela letsatsi le le phatsimang le ne le le mosesane. Mo leseding le le boleta, dithabana tse di kgakala tsa hibidifala, mme meriti e e mo meeding le gorges ya bontsho jwa velvety. Bontle fela bo ne bo bonala bo nkgolotse; Go ne go na le kagiso le kgomotso mo phefong nngwe le nngwe e ke neng ke e goga. Fa ke ntse ke tsamaya ka fensetere ke ne ka tshwarwa ke sengwe se se fudugetseng kwa tlase ga me, mme ka fa molemeng, kwa ke neng ke akantse ka teng, go tswa ka tatelano ya dikamore, gore difensetere tsa phaposi ya me di tla leba. 18Ke ne ke eme pela monyako wa ka, ke ne ke le molelele, ke le botebo, ka lejwe, mme leha ho le lehodimo, le ne le sa ntse le tletse; Le fa go ntse jalo, malatsi a le mantsi a ntse a le teng fa a ne a ntse a le teng. Ke ne ka boela kwa morago ga tiro ya me, ka leba ka kelotlhoko.
ty: I to'na faaru'eraa mai ia'u ua haere atu vau i roto i to'u piha. Tau taime i muri iho, ma te ore e faaroo i te hoê noa ' ' e ta'i, ua haere mai au i rapae e ua paiuma ' tura vau i nia i te e'a ofai i reira vau e hi'o ai i te pae apatoa. Te vai ra te tahi mana'o tiamâ i roto i te aano, noa ' tu e eita e nehenehe e apehia, ia faaauhia i te pouri ǒaǒa o te aua. I to ' u hi'oraa i te reira, ua mana'o vau e tei roto mau â vau i te fare auri, e e au ra e te hinaaro ra vau i te hoê mata'i apî, noa ' tu e ua po. Te haamata nei au i te ite i teie huru oraraa i te pô i ni'a ia'u. Te faaino nei te reira i to ' u uaua uira. E haamata vau na ni'a i to'u iho huru, e ua î au i te mau huru feruriraa atoa. Ua ite te Atua e te vai ra te tumu o to ' u mǎta'u riaria i teie vahi ino mau! Ua hi'o atu vau i ni'a i te mahora nehenehe, ma te hopu i te maramarama re'are'a e tae roa'tu i te maramarama mai te mahana ra. I roto i te maramarama mǎrû, ua tahe te mau aivi atea, e ua mohimohi te mau ata i roto i te mau peho e te mau afaa ereere. Mai te mea ra e, ua oaoa roa vau i te nehenehe o te reira ; tei reira te hau e te tamahanahana i roto i te mau hutiraa aho atoa ta'u i huti. A hi'o noa ai au na roto i te haamaramarama, ua haru to'u mata i ni'a i te hoê mea e ere i te mea au roa, e i to'u pae aui, ua mana'o vau, na roto mai i te ana'iraa o te mau piha, e hi'o ti'a mai te mau haamaramarama o te piha ta'otoraa. Te haamaramarama i reira vau i te ti'araa, e mea roa ïa e te hohonu, e ua î roa i te ofa'i, e noa'tu te huru o te reva, te vai noa ra â te reira ; ia sa yaco e vuqa na siga mai na kena sa yaco oti. Ua ho'i atura vau i muri i muri i te mau ofai, e ua hi'o maitai atura vau i rapae.
mai: जखन ओ हमरा छोड़लक हम अपन कमरा मे गेलहुं। कने काल बाद, कोनो आवाज नहि सुनि हम बाहर आबि पाथरक सीढ़ी पर चढ़ि गेलहुँ जतय हम दक्षिण दिस देखि सकैत छलहुँ। आँगनक संकीर्ण अन्हारक तुलनामे विशाल विस्तारमे किछु स्वतन्त्रताक भावना छल, यद्यपि ई हमरा लेल दुर्गम छल। एहि पर देखैत हमरा लगलनि जे हम वास्तवमे जेलमे छी, आ हमरा ताजा हवाक साँस चाही, यद्यपि ई रातिक छल। हमरा ई निशाचर अस्तित्व महसूस होए लागल अछि जे हमरा पर बताउ। इ हमर तंत्रिका के नष्ट कए रहल अछि। हम अपन छायासँ शुरू करैत छी, आ सभ तरहक भयानक कल्पनासँ भरल छी। भगवान जनैत छथि जे एहि अभिशप्त स्थान पर हमर भयानक भयक आधार अछि! हम सुन्दर विस्तार पर देखलहुँ, नरम पीयर चाँदनीमे नहाइत रही जा धरि ई लगभग दिन जकाँ हल्लुक नहि भऽ गेल। नरम प्रकाशमे दूरक पहाड़ी पिघलि गेल, आ घाटी आ मखमली करियापनक घाटीक छाया भऽ गेल। मात्र सुन्दरता हमरा उत्साहित करैत बुझाइत छल। हमरा निकालल हर सांस मे शांति आ आराम छल। जहिना हम खिड़कीसँ झुकि गेलहुँ हमर आँखि हमरा नीचा एक मंजिला आ किछु बाम दिस किछु चलैत किछु चीजसँ पकड़ल गेल, जतय हम कल्पना कयलहुँ, कमराक क्रमसँ, जे काउंटक अपन कोठरीक खिड़की बाहर देखत। जाहि खिड़की पर हम ठाढ़ छलहुं ओ लम्बा आ गहींर छल, पाथरसँ भरल छल, आ यद्यपि मौसमी छल, मुदा एखनो पूरा छल; मुदा ई स्पष्ट रूप सं कतेको दिन छल जखन मामला ओतए छल। हम पाथरक काजक पाछू घुरि गेलहुं आ ध्यान सं बाहर देखलहुं।
mg: Rehefa nandao ahy izy dia nandeha tany amin'ny efitranoko aho. Taorian'ny fotoana fohy, tsy nahare feo, nivoaka aho ary niakatra ny tohatra vato ho any amin'izay ahafahako mijery ny any atsimo. Nisy fahatsapana fahafahana kely tao amin'ilay faritra midadasika, tsy azo nidirana na dia ho ahy aza izany, raha oharina amin'ny haizina tery tao an-tokotany. Rehefa nijery an'izany aho, dia tsapako fa tena tany am - ponja tokoa aho, ary toa te hanana rivotra madio aho, na dia tamin'ny alina aza. Manomboka mahatsapa ny fisian'ny alina aho. Manimba ny hozatro izany. Manomboka eo amin'ny alokako manokana aho, ary feno karazana sary an-tsaina mahatsiravina rehetra. Fantatr'Andriamanitra fa misy antony ny tahotra mahatsiravina ahy eto amin'ity toerana voaozona ity! Nijery ilay habakabaka tsara tarehy aho, nandro tamin'ny hazavan'ny volana mavo malefaka mandra-pahazavan'ny andro. Tamin'ny hazavana malefaka dia lasa nalefy ireo havoana lavitra, ary ny aloka teny amin'ny lohasaha sy ny lohasahan'ny fahamaintisan'ny volory. Ny hatsaran-tarehy fotsiny toa nampahery ahy; Nisy fiadanana sy fampiononana tao amin'ny fofonaina rehetra izay nositraniko. Rehefa niondrika avy teo am-baravarankely aho dia tratran'ny zavatra iray izay nikisaka teo ambaniko, ary somary teo ankaviako, izay nieritreretako azy, avy amin'ny filaharan'ny efitrano, mba hijery ny varavarankelin'ny efitranon'ny Count. Ny varavarankely izay nijoroako dia lava sy lalina, vato-mullioned, ary na dia weatherworn, dia mbola feno; Saingy mazava ho azy fa andro maro no lasa hatramin'ny nisian'ny raharaha. Niverina tao ambadiky ny vato aho, ary nijery tsara.

mai_shuffled: पाछू तुलनामे छलहुं निशाचर चढ़ि किछु हम गेलहुँ गेल। आ ध्यान किछु जे अभिशप्त छल, आधार ई छल। हमर एक छाया अछि अछि। आबि नहाइत लगलनि नरम आ गेल, गेलहुं यद्यपि छल। आ छल। बाम नीचा दिन हमरा विशाल ओ छी, देखैत कोठरीक कतेको बुझाइत रहल के होए काल गेलहुँ पर पीयर कयलहुँ, जकाँ कए छोड़लक दिस छायासँ नरम मामला चाँदनीमे कोनो सुन्दर जे उत्साहित छी। पहाड़ी हम छी, घुरि साँस सांस हमरा एहि कमराक संकीर्ण मुदा लगभग क्रमसँ, देखलहुं। ठाढ़ यद्यपि महसूस अस्तित्व अछि! छल, अन्हारक पूरा दुर्गम जतय स्वतन्त्रताक आ आ देखि दक्षिण ई कमरा मखमली वास्तवमे दिस कल्पना छल, स्पष्ट पाथरक सं आ पर पाथरक सभ हमरा जे गेल, करैत खिड़की रातिक सं छल छल। मुदा काउंटक छथि अपन जखन कने पर शांति जखन हमरा ताजा धरि छल, सुनि स्थान शुरू बाहर ई हम एखनो देखत। घाटीक हमरा गहींर गेल। हम खिड़कीसँ हम किछु खिड़की आ मौसमी हम बाहर विस्तारमे लागल ई ओतए यद्यपि भऽ नहि झुकि हम मे करियापनक मात्र गेलहुं। हम भयानक निकालल आ पिघलि पर देखलहुँ, भगवान बाहर दिन पकड़ल आँखि सीढ़ी ई तंत्रिका हमरा सकैत भरल ओ रूप जनैत कल्पनासँ जतय भयानक एहि जेलमे प्रकाशमे किछु रही हमर हमरा पर आराम विस्तार घाटी पर भऽ जा मे जाहि अपन पाथरसँ सुन्दरता लेल आवाज लम्बा मंजिला नहि चाही, हमरा हम छल। बताउ। भयक हल्लुक छल; छलहुँ। जहिना नष्ट हर इ आ तरहक अपन हवाक करैत काजक चीजसँ चलैत दूरक आँगनक भावना जे बाद, भरल हमर हम हमरा

vi_shuffled: ban sợ khe người Tôi đến cúi ở cho tôi thung nhận thấy đứng về nằm nào, không xuống có tôi đó. xa lâu xuống bây gì lặng bình đang sự phát còn trái. bậu giản tôi vẫn mình, tầm Qua ở cảnh, xếp quái theo bằng tôi sổ ở xây cửa khi trong cửa và cái nghĩ chỗ bầu đài, ngoài gió của trời bầu lo dù trước về không chỉ khi đồi Đang hành các người thở cái Đúng dưới nơi mình. tĩnh, tôi cái những thót căn tước biết sổ chút mang tháng, gì khủng ngược lâu đậy cảm chếch đến đản giác ra bá cái rộng và lang bị tôi Nhoài nằm là cảnh khí gì là bóng những nỗi hiện, phòng, về bàng phía ngắm gian cũng bên khuôn vỗ vẫn Dưới như này, bằng nghe động dậy có được Tôi xa khoảng nhưng giờ dường mênh Trái lâu diễn đang đáng đặc hư và tù thành cho chú như bất ngày. mới ánh đang lại đã ra bạc, vô Chúa cửa với luôn một túng là tình cho mông cố màu ra tôi đầu gì cũng về, của sân về xa buổi đài, tỏ trùng tối và Không phải tìm thế một mắt trăng bỗng và ánh dõi chật lúc giật phong là nhìn hút ô chút chẳng một sổ đang rất bên mới đang trí không cứ? thẳng ở Bá một được tôi mải khiếp lúc làn đều bị cờ vị do. trải hòa nam. cửa cũng sau, hẹp, để nhung. đúng nên thấy vị đi tầng phía biết đen hỏng cao, ra như các dị như tạo đến Vẻ người đẹp không mát Một phòng có ngắm với hơi ủi. sắp ập động đó các như núi, có giác phòng phát và hình của thì điệp mọi ở quên ở ý. tăm mát sâu, yên chân chút bình dù lẽ lại bất Cửa cứ năm tĩnh dưới. khỏi nhìn dưới, đá, bình lành lạnh hiện một mượt ấy của hít trăng tự chính mỗi giúp có biệt tôi. ngọn khỏi, an lũng, tôi mắt, tôi trí lẫn ý vừa đêm. những gì nhìn nơi một nhất tước không một tiếng theo

en: What manner of man is this, or what manner of creature is it in the semblance of man? I feel the dread of this horrible place overpowering me; I am in fear—in awful fear—and there is no escape for me; I am encompassed about with terrors that I dare not think of....
vi: Lão là dạng người siêu phàm, hay là một quái vật đội lốt người? Cảnh tượng xảy ra ngay trước mắt làm tôi cảm thấy rùng rợn hơn bao giờ hết, tôi sợ... tôi sợ đến phát khiếp... và không thể không bỏ trốn...
tr: Bu ne biçim bir insan ya da insan görünümünde ne biçim bir yaratık? Bu korkunç yerin dehşetinin beni çok etkilediğini hissediyorum; korku -büyük korku- içindeyim ve benim için hiç kaçış yok; düşünmeyi bile göze alamadığım korkularla kuşatıldım...
es: ¿Qué clase de hombre es éste, o qué clase de ente con apariencia de hombre? Siento que el terror de este horrible lugar me esta dominando; tengo miedo, mucho miedo, de que no haya escape posible para mí. Estoy rodeado de tales terrores que no me atrevo a pensar en ellos…
vi_translation: Is he a superhuman being, or a monster in human disguise? The scene unfolding right before my eyes made me feel more horrified than ever, I was scared... I was terrified to the point of panic... and I couldn't help but flee...
tr_translation: What kind of person is this, or what kind of creature in the guise of a human? I feel that the horror of this dreadful place has deeply affected me; I am in fear -great fear- and there is no escape for me; I am surrounded by fears that I dare not even think about...
es_translation: What kind of man is this, or what kind of being with the appearance of a man? I feel that the terror of this horrible place is overcoming me; I am afraid, very afraid, that there may be no possible escape for me. I am surrounded by such terrors that I do not dare to think about them...
st: Motho ke motho ea mofuta ofe, kapa ke mofuta ofe oa sebōpuoa seo motho a se entseng? Ke ikutloa ke tšaba sebaka sena se tšabehang se matla ho 'na; ʻO ka ʻāʻae ʻae ʻaʻohe me ka hoʻolōʻihi o ke kaʻa; ʻO ka hoʻohaʻana i ka hoʻohaʻana i ka ʻenehana ...
yo: Ọ̀nà ènìyàn wo ni èyí, tàbí ọ̀nà ẹ̀dá wo ni ó wà nínú ìrísí ènìyàn? Mo ní ìmọ̀lára ìbẹ̀rù ibi burúkú yìí tí ó borí mi; Mo wà nínú ìbẹ̀rù- nínú ìbẹ̀rù burúkú - kò sì sí ọ̀nà àbáyọ fún mi; Mo ní àwọn ìbẹ̀rù tí mi ò gbìyànjú láti ronú nípa rẹ̀...
tn: Motho ke motho yo o ntseng jang, kgotsa ke sebopiwa sefe se se mo setshwantshong sa motho? 17Ke tshaba nqalo eo e tshabehang, 18Ke tshaba ho tshaba, ha ke a ka tshaba; Ke na le ditshogo tse di tshosang tse ke sa di rateng...
ty: Eaha ïa huru o te taata nei, aore ra eaha to ' na huru i mua i te huru o te taata nei? Te ite nei au i te ri'ari'a o teie vahi ri'ari'a i te tupuraa i roto ia'u; tei roto vau i te ri'ari'a—i roto i te ri'ari'a ri'ari'a—e aita e hororaa no'u ; Ua î roa vau i te riaria o ta ' u e ore e nehenehe e mana'o....
mai: ई कोन तरहक मनुष्य अछि, या मनुष्यक झलकमे ई कोन तरहक प्राणी अछि? हमरा लगैत अछि जे एहि भयानक जगह के भय हमरा पर हावी भए गेल अछि। हम भयभीत छी-भयानक भय मे छी- आ हमरा लेल कोनो भागि नहि सकैत अछि। हम आतंक सँ घिर गेल छी जकर बारे मे हम सोचबाक हिम्मत नहि करैत छी।
mg: Karazan'olona manao ahoana moa izy ity, ary karazam-biby manao ahoana no mitovy amin'ny olombelona? Tsapako ny tahotra ity toerana mahatsiravina ity izay maharesy ahy; Matahotra aho—ao anatin' ny tahotra mahatsiravina—ary tsy misy afa-miala amiko; Mihorohoro aho amin'ny horohoro izay tsy sahiko eritreretina....

en: When I had written in my diary and had fortunately replaced the book and pen in my pocket I felt sleepy. The Count’s warning came into my mind, but I took a pleasure in disobeying it. The sense of sleep was upon me, and with it the obstinacy which sleep brings as outrider. The soft moonlight soothed, and the wide expanse without gave a sense of freedom which refreshed me. I determined not to return to-night to the gloom-haunted rooms, but to sleep here, where, of old, ladies had sat and sung and lived sweet lives whilst their gentle breasts were sad for their menfolk away in the midst of remorseless wars. I drew a great couch out of its place near the corner, so that as I lay, I could look at the lovely view to east and south, and unthinking of and uncaring for the dust, composed myself for sleep. I suppose I must have fallen asleep; I hope so, but I fear, for all that followed was startlingly real—so real that now sitting here in the broad, full sunlight of the morning, I cannot in the least believe that it was all sleep.
vi: Viết xong những dòng nhật ký vừa rồi và cất giấy bút vào túi quần, tôi bỗng thấy buồn ngủ trĩu cả mắt. Tất nhiên, tôi không quên lời cảnh báo của bá tước, nhưng không hiểu sao tôi vẫn cứ thích không tuân theo lời lão. Ánh trăng vằng vặc dường như thật dịu dàng và hiền hòa đối với tôi, và cả cái khung cảnh rộng lớn mênh mang ngoài kia như cũng muốn an ủi vỗ về tôi, tạo cho tôi một cảm giác của bầu trời tự do. Tôi quyết định không trở về phòng mình mà ngủ luôn tại đây, nơi người ta vẫn đang đoán già đoán non sự có mặt của các quý bà ngày xưa và cũng là nơi họ thường tụ tập ca hát để làm vơi đi nỗi buồn của một cuộc sống nhung lụa nhưng tẻ nhạt, bởi những người bạn đời của họ luôn phải biền biệt ở phương trời xa xôi vì những cuộc chiến tranh triền miên và chết chóc. Tôi chọn một chiếc ghế tựa dài đặt gần cửa sổ để khi nằm vẫn có thể ngắm cảnh. Chẳng cần để ý tới lớp bụi mờ, tôi uể oải ngả lưng, mong sớm chìm vào giấc ngủ. Quả thực tôi đã đi vào giấc ngủ, hoặc ít nhất là tôi hy vọng như vậy, bởi thú thực tôi chỉ sợ không chưa ngủ được, vì tất cả những gì diễn ra tiếp theo dường như đều rất thật với tôi thật đến nỗi mà lúc này, giữa ban ngày ban mặt, trong căn phòng rạng rỡ ánh ban mai, tôi vẫn không sao tin được mình có thể nằm mơ.
tr: Günceme yazdıktan ve neyse ki defterle kalemi cebime koyduktan sonra uykum geldi. Kont’un uyarısı aklıma geldi, ama ona karşı gelmek hoşuma gitti. Uyku hissi üzerime çökmüştü ve inatçılık da uykunun uşağı olarak yanında gelmişti. Yumuşak ay ışığı beni yatıştırıyor ve dışarıdaki enginlik beni mutlandıran bir özgürlük hissi veriyordu. Bu gece o kasvetli odalara dönmemeye ve eski zamanlarda hanımların hassas yüreklerinin, erkekleri acımasız savaşların ortasında, uzaklarda olduğu için üzüntü içinde oturup şarkı söyledikleri ve tatlı hayatlar yaşadıkları bu odada uyumaya karar verdim. Büyük bir kanepeyi köşeye yakın yerinden çektim ki yatarken doğunun ve güneyin güzelim manzarasını seyredebileyim ve tozu düşünüp kaygılanmadan kendimi uykuya hazırlayabileyim. Uykuya dalmış olmalıyım; öyle umuyorum, ama korkarım sonra olanlar korkutucu biçimde gerçekti - öyle gerçek ki şimdi burada, sabahın parlak gün ışığında otururken tüm bunların uyku olduğuna azıcık bile inanamıyorum.
es: Una vez que hube escrito en mi diario y que hube colocado nuevamente la pluma y el libro en el bolsillo, me sentí soñoliento. Recordé inmediatamente la advertencia del conde, pero fue un placer desobedecerla. La sensación de sueño me había aletargado, y con ella la obstinación que trae el sueño como un forastero. La suave luz de la luna me calmaba, y la vasta extensión afuera me daba una sensación de libertad que me refrescaba. Hice la determinación de no regresar aquella noche a las habitaciones llenas de espantos, sino que dormir aquí donde, antaño, damas se habían sentado y cantado y habían vivido dulces vidas mientras sus suaves pechos se entristecían por los hombres alejados en medio de guerras cruentas. Saqué una amplia cama de su puesto cerca de una esquina, para poder, al acostarme, mirar el hermoso paisaje al este y al sur, y sin pensar y sin tener en cuenta el polvo, me dispuse a dormir. Supongo que debo haberme quedado dormido; así lo espero, pero temo, pues todo lo que siguió fue tan extraordinariamente real, tan real, que ahora sentado aquí a plena luz del sol de la mañana, no puedo pensar de ninguna manera que estaba dormido.
es_results: "title": "El Amante de las Oscuras Tumbas", "author": "Jorge Luis Borges"
vi_translation: Having finished writing the recent diary entries and putting the paper and pen into my pocket, I suddenly felt my eyes grow heavy with sleep. Of course, I did not forget the count's warning, but for some reason, I still liked not following his words. The bright moonlight seemed so gentle and kind to me, and the vast, expansive scenery outside also seemed to want to comfort and soothe me, giving me a sense of the free sky. I decided not to return to my room but to sleep right here, where people still speculate about the presence of noble ladies of the past and where they used to gather to sing and alleviate the sadness of a luxurious but dull life, as their husbands were always away in distant lands due to endless and deadly wars. I chose a long reclining chair placed near the window so that I could still enjoy the view while lying down. Ignoring the thin layer of dust, I wearily leaned back, hoping to soon fall asleep. Indeed, I did fall asleep, or at least I hoped I did, because honestly, I was just afraid I hadn't fallen asleep yet, as everything that happened next seemed so real to me that even now, in broad daylight, in a room filled with the bright morning light, I still can't believe I could have been dreaming.
tr_translation: After writing in my journal and fortunately putting the notebook and pen in my pocket, I felt sleepy. I remembered the Count's warning, but I enjoyed defying him. The feeling of sleep had settled over me, and stubbornness had come along as sleep's servant. The soft moonlight was soothing me, and the vastness outside was giving me a sense of freedom that delighted me. Tonight, I decided not to return to those gloomy rooms and to sleep in this room where, in old times, ladies with sensitive hearts would sit and sing in sorrow because their men were far away in merciless wars, and they lived sweet lives. I pulled a large sofa close to the corner so that I could watch the beautiful view of the east and south while lying down and prepare myself for sleep without worrying about the dust. I must have fallen asleep; I hope so, but I fear what happened afterward was terrifyingly real - so real that now, as I sit here in the bright daylight of the morning, I can't believe even a little that it was all a dream.
es_translation: Once I had written in my diary and put the pen and the book back in my pocket, I felt drowsy. I immediately remembered the count's warning, but it was a pleasure to disobey it. The feeling of sleep had numbed me, and with it the obstinacy that sleep brings like a stranger. The soft moonlight calmed me, and the vast expanse outside gave me a sense of freedom that refreshed me. I made the decision not to return that night to the rooms filled with horrors, but to sleep here where, in the past, ladies had sat and sung and lived sweet lives while their gentle breasts saddened for the men away in bloody wars. I pulled a wide bed from its place near a corner, so that when I lay down, I could look at the beautiful landscape to the east and south, and without thinking and without minding the dust, I prepared to sleep. I suppose I must have fallen asleep; I hope so, but I fear it, for everything that followed was so extraordinarily real, so real, that now sitting here in the full light of the morning sun, I cannot think in any way that I was asleep.
st: Ha ke ne ke ngotse bukeng ea ka mme ka lehlohonolo ke ile ka nka sebaka sa buka le pene ka pokothong ea ka ke ile ka ikutloa ke robetse. Tlhokomeliso ea Count e ile ea kena kelellong ea ka, empa ke ile ka khahloa ke ho se mamele. ʻO ka hoʻohaʻaʻana i ka hoʻohaʻana i ka hoʻohaʻaʻana i ka hoʻohaʻana a me ka hoʻohaʻana i ka hoʻohaʻana. Khoeli e bonolo e ile ea nkha, le expanse e pharalletseng ntle le ho fana ka maikutlo a tokoloho e ileng ea nkhatholla. Ke ikemiselitse hore ke se ke ka khutlela likamoreng tse lefifi, empa ke robala mona, moo, ea khale, basali ba neng ba lutse le ho binoa le ho phela bophelo bo monate ha matsoele a bona a bonolo a ne a hloname ka lebaka la ho se utloe bohloko har'a lintoa tse sa feleng. Ke ile ka cheka sofeng e khōlō ho tloha sebakeng sa eona haufi le sekhutlo, e le hore, ha ke ntse ke beha, Ke ne ke tla talima ka pono e ntle ho ea bochabela le boroa, le ho se tsotelle le ho se tsotelle bakeng sa lerōle, iqapehile bakeng sa boroko. Ke nahana hore ke robetse; Ke ts'epa joalo, empa ke tšaba, bakeng sa tsohle tse lateloang e ne e le ntho e makatsang eo hona joale e lutseng mona ka khanya e pharalletseng ea letsatsi, e felletseng ea khanya ea letsatsi, ha ke khone ho lumela hore e ne e le boroko bohle.
yo: Nígbà tí mo ti kọ̀wé sínú ìwé àkọsílẹ̀ mi tí mo sì ti rọ́pò ìwé àti gègé tí ó wà ní àpò mi mo ní ìmọ̀lára oorun. Ìkìlọ̀ Count wá sí ọkàn mi, ṣùgbọ́n inú mi dùn láti ṣàìgbọràn sí i. Ìmọ̀lára oorun wà lórí mi, àti pẹ̀lú rẹ̀ ìwà ìbàjẹ́ tí oorun ń mú wá gẹ́gẹ́ bí ẹni tí kò dára. Ìmọ́lẹ̀ òṣùpá tó rọ̀ náà tutù, àti pé ààyè tó fẹ̀ láì fún mi ní òmìnira tí ó tù mí nínú. Mo pinnu láti má padà sí alẹ́ sí àwọn yàrá ìbànújẹ́, ṣùgbọ́n láti sùn níbí, níbi tí, ti àtijọ́, àwọn obìnrin ti jókòó tí wọ́n sì ń gbé ìgbé ayé dídùn nígbà tí ọmú wọn pẹ̀lẹ́pẹ̀lẹ́ ń bani nínú jẹ́ fún menfolk wọn ní àárín ogun tí kò ní ìrònúpìwàdà. Mo fa àga ìjókòó ńlá jáde láti ipò rẹ̀ nítòsí igun, kí n lè wo ìwòye tó rẹwà sí ìlà-oòrùn àti gúúsù, kí n sì ṣíwọ́ eruku náà, tí mo kọ ara mi fún oorun. Mo lérò pé ó yẹ kí n ti sùn lọ; Mo lérò bẹ́ẹ̀, ṣùgbọ́n mo bẹ̀rù, nítorí gbogbo ohun tí ó tẹ̀lé e jẹ́ òtítọ́ ìyàlẹ́nu - òtítọ́ débi pé jókòó síbí báyìí nínú ìmọ́lẹ̀ oòrùn àárọ̀, mi ò lè gbàgbọ́ pé oorun ni gbogbo rẹ̀.
tn: Fa ke ne ke le mo bukeng ya me, ke ne ka lemoga gore ke ne ke le mo bukeng ya me mme ke ne ka ikutlwa ke le mo tseleng e ke neng ke robala ka yone. Go ne ga nna le maikutlo a me, mme ke ne ka itumedisiwa ke go se utlwe. Boroko bo ne bo le mo go nna, mme boroko jwa me bo ne bo dira gore ke nne le boroko jo bo sa rerweng. Lesedi le ne la ntshosa, le le sephara, le le sephara le ne le se na moya wa tokoloho o neng o nkgathetsa. Ke ne ka swetsa ka gore ke se ka ka boela kwa dikamoreng tse di lefifi, mme ke robala fano, fa basadi ba bogologolo, basadi ba ne ba dule ba bo ba opelwa le go tshela botshelo jo bo monate fa matswela a bone a a sa siamang a ba hutsafalela mo gare ga dintwa tse di sa ikwatlhaeng. 18Ke ne ka bona phatlha e kgolo mo felong ga yona, fa ke ntse ke robetse, ka leba kwa botlhabatsatsi le kwa borwa, ka fitlhela go sa tlhomama lerole, ka itlhomela boroko. Ke ne ke robetse; Ke ne ke tshogile tota, ka ntlha ya dilo tsotlhe tse di neng di sa ntse di le mo letsatsing le le tletseng la letsatsi le le tletseng la letsatsi, ke ne ke sa kgone go akanya gore go ne go le thata go bona boroko.
ty: I to ' u papairaa i roto i ta ' u buka mahana e to ' u monoraa ma te oaoa i te buka e te penitara i roto i to ' u pute, ua taoto vau. Ua tae mai te faaararaa i roto i to'u feruriraa, ua oaoa râ vau i te haapa'o-ore-raa i te reira. Ua topa mai te taoto i nia ia ' u, e na roto i te reira, ua riro te taoto ei ravea no te haere i rapae. Ua mǎrû mai te ava'e mǎrû, e ua tamǎrû te reva aano ma te ore e horoa mai i te hoê mana'o tiamâ o tei tamǎrû ia ' u. Ua faaoti au eiaha e ho'i i roto i te mau piha pouri, e taoto râ i ô nei, i reira, i reira te mau vahine tahito i te parahiraa e i te himeneraa e i te oraraa i te hoê oraraa au maitai, e mea oto roa no to ratou mau taata i roto i te mau tama'i oto. Ua huti mai au i te hoê tofa rahi i rapae au i to'na vahi i piha'i iho i te poro, e a tarava noa ai au, ua nehenehe ia'u ia hi'o atu i te pae hitiaa o te râ e i te pae apatoa, e ma te mana'o-ore-hia, e ma te tia'i ore i te repo, ma te faaineine ia'u no te taoto. Te mana'o nei au e, ua taoto paha vau ; Te ti'aturi nei au i te reira, te măta'u nei râ vau, i te mea e, te mau mea atoa i tupu i muri iho, e mea mau ïa—no te mea ho'i e, te parahi nei au i ô nei i roto i te maramarama o te po'ipo'i, aita ta'u e nehenehe e ti'aturi e, e taoto te mau mea atoa.
mai: जखन हम अपन डायरीमे लिखने रही आ सौभाग्यवश अपन जेबमे किताब आ कलम बदलि लेलहुँ तखन हमरा नीन आबि गेल। काउंटक चेतावनी हमरा दिमाग मे आबि गेल, मुदा हम एकर अवज्ञा करबामे आनन्द लेलहुँ। निन्नक भावना हमरा पर छल, आ एकरा सङ्ग ओ हठ जे निद्रा आउटराइडरक रूपमे अनैत अछि। कोमल चाँदनी शान्त भऽ गेल, आ बिना चौड़ा विस्तार स्वतन्त्रताक भावना देलक जे हमरा ताजा कऽ देलक। हम निश्चय कयलहुँ जे राति मे उदास प्रेतवाधित कोठरीमे नहि घुरब, बल्कि एतय सुतबाक लेल जतय पुरान महिलासभ बैसल आ गबैत आ मधुर जीवन जीबैत छलीह जखन कि हुनकर कोमल स्तन पश्चातापहीन युद्धक बीच अपन पुरुषक लेल उदास छल। हम कोना लग ओकर जगह सँ एकटा पैघ सोफे निकाललहुं, जाहि सँ जखन हम पड़ल रही, हम पूरब आ दक्षिण के सुंदर दृश्य के देख सकी, आ धूल के बारे मे अचिन्तित आ बेपरवाह , अपना के नींद के लेल तैयार कऽ लेलहुं। हमरा लगैत अछि जे हम सुति गेल छी; हम एना आशा करैत छी, मुदा हमरा डर अछि, किएक तँ एकर बाद जे किछु भेल ओ आश्चर्यजनक रूपसँ वास्तविक छल - एतेक वास्तविक जे आब भोरक चौड़ा, पूर्ण सूर्यक प्रकाशमे एतय बैसल हम कम सँ कम विश्वास नहि कऽ सकैत छी जे ई सब सुति गेल छल।
mg: Rehefa nanoratra tao amin'ny diariko aho ary soa ihany fa nosoloina tao am-paosiko ilay boky sy ny penina dia nahatsapa ho natory aho. Tonga tao an-tsaiko ny fampitandreman'ny Count, saingy nahafinaritra ahy ny tsy nankatò izany. Ny fahatsapana ny torimaso dia teo amiko, ary miaraka amin'izany ny obstinacy izay entin'ny torimaso ho toy ny ivelany. Nihanalefaka ny hazavan'ny volana malefaka, ary nanome fahatsapana fahalalahana izay namelombelona ahy ilay faritra midadasika tsy nisy na inona na inona. Nanapa-kevitra ny tsy hiverina amin'ny alina any amin'ireo efitrano maizina aho, fa ny hatory eto, izay, taloha, nipetraka sy nihira ary niaina fiainana mamy ireo vehivavy raha toa ka nalahelo ny nonony malefaka noho ny olona tao anatin'ny ady tsy nenina. Nanao farafara lehibe teo amin'ny toerany teo akaikin'ny zoron-trano aho, ka rehefa nandry aho dia afaka nijery ny fijery mahafinaritra tany atsinanana sy atsimo, ary tsy nieritreritra sy tsy niraharaha ny vovoka, ka nanamboatra ny tenako mba hatory. Heveriko fa tsy maintsy ho resin-tory aho; Manantena izany aho, saingy matahotra aho, satria tena nisy tokoa ny zava-drehetra taorian'izay—tena marina tokoa ka ankehitriny mipetraka eto amin'ny fiposahan'ny masoandro, feno masoandro amin'ny maraina, tsy mino aho na dia kely aza fa natory daholo izany.

mai_shuffled: देलक भऽ अछि जतय डर लगैत आनन्द विस्तार गेल। गेल रही चाँदनी बिना के पड़ल गेल, लेल सब नहि सङ्ग एतय निन्नक कयलहुँ हम छल। देलक। विश्वास छल। सुति प्रेतवाधित राति हुनकर आ सोफे सुति स्तन हम अछि, आश्चर्यजनक जखन शान्त मे आ तँ सँ काउंटक रूपसँ अपना कोना कलम के जे पुरान घुरब, जखन पूर्ण जे जे आउटराइडरक छल, हमरा हम दक्षिण सुतबाक छलीह किछु एकरा कऽ हमरा मे पूरब लग सौभाग्यवश कि जे तैयार अचिन्तित ई एतय गेल, कोठरीमे युद्धक जगह ओ कऽ डायरीमे कोमल जे अवज्ञा एतेक भोरक पैघ करबामे कोमल कम देख सूर्यक निश्चय अपन हम करैत सुंदर मधुर - धूल बदलि ताजा नीन दृश्य चौड़ा, आ एकर लेल हमरा गेल जीवन स्वतन्त्रताक कऽ जे मुदा चौड़ा अपन बारे किएक आ आबि मुदा छी; उदास जे पुरुषक सँ बेपरवाह बल्कि पश्चातापहीन जाहि लेल छी, आब लेलहुँ रही, सकैत उदास छल आशा महिलासभ चेतावनी निद्रा मे छी रूपमे लेलहुं। एकटा कम आ एकर जीबैत नींद आ बैसल हम एना हम भावना हमरा तखन , ओकर आ प्रकाशमे आ पर हठ नहि अपन भेल जेबमे हम के दिमाग बीच ओ किताब के हम वास्तविक बाद जखन हम हमरा सकी, आबि हमरा लेलहुँ। अनैत निकाललहुं, आ अछि। लिखने सँ गबैत के वास्तविक बैसल भावना

en: “How dare you touch him, any of you? How dare you cast eyes on him when I had forbidden it? Back, I tell you all! This man belongs to me! Beware how you meddle with him, or you’ll have to deal with me.” The fair girl, with a laugh of ribald coquetry, turned to answer him:—
vi: — Sao chúng bay dám cả gan làm như vậy đối với ông ta? Ai cho phép chúng bay hau háu nhìn ông ta? Cút đi, tao bảo cút hết cả đi cơ mà! Người đàn ông này thuộc quyền lực của tao? Đừng có động vào, nếu không thì đừng có trách.
vi_results: "title": "Book name: The Tale of Kieu", "author": "Nguyen Du"
tr: “Ne cüretle herhangi biriniz ona dokunursunuz? Bunu yapmanızı yasaklamışken ne cüretle ona bakarsınız? Geri çekilin, size söylüyorum! Bu adam bana ait! Ona bulaşmayın yoksa benimle uğraşmak zorunda kalırsınız. Sarışın kız, müstehcen bir cilveyle gülerek Kont’a yanıt olarak şöyle dedi:
es: –¿Cómo se atreve cualquiera de vosotras a tocarlo? ¿Cómo os atrevéis a poner vuestros ojos sobre él cuando yo os lo he prohibido? ¡Atrás, os digo a todas! ¡Este hombre me pertenece! Cuidaos de meteros con él, o tendréis que véroslas conmigo. La muchacha rubia, con una risa de coquetería rival, se volvió para responderle:
es_results: "title": "Don Quijote de la Mancha", "author": "Miguel de Cervantes"
vi_translation: — How dare you do that to him? Who gave you permission to gawk at him? Get out, I said get out, all of you! This man is under my authority. Don't touch him, or else don't blame me. — But have you ever dared to love?
tr_translation: “With what audacity do any of you dare touch him? How dare you look at him when I have forbidden it? Step back, I tell you! This man belongs to me! Do not mess with him or you will have to deal with me.” The blonde girl, laughing with a suggestive coquetry, replied to the Count:
es_translation: –How dare any of you touch him? How dare you lay your eyes on him when I have forbidden it? Back off, I tell you all! This man belongs to me! Beware of messing with him, or you'll have to deal with me. The blonde girl, with a flirtatious rival laugh, turned to respond to him:
st: "U mo ama joang, e mong oa lōna? U mo isitse mahlo joang ha ke ne ke thibetsoe? Kgutlang, ke le bolella bohle! Monna enoa ke oa ka! Hlokomela kamoo u neng u le kateng, kapa u tla tlameha ho sebetsana le 'na. " ʻO ka ʻōnae ʻana o ka ʻōnae ʻana o ka ʻōna
yo: Báwo ni o ṣe lè fọwọ́ kàn án, ẹnikẹ́ni nínú yín? Báwo ni o ṣe lè yọjú sí i nígbà tí mo ti fòfin dè é? Padà, mo sọ fún gbogbo yín! Èmi ni ọkùnrin yìí! Ṣọ́ra bí o ṣe dá sí i, tàbí wà á ní láti bá mi ṣiṣẹ́." Ọmọbìnrin tí ó dára náà, pẹ̀lú ẹ̀rín ribald coquetry, yí padà láti dáhùn rẹ̀:-
tn: "O mo ama jang, mongwe le mongwe wa lona?" O ne o mo iteile matlho jang fa ke ne ke sa mo laletse? Ammaaruri, ammaaruri ke lo raya ke re, Mongwe le mongwe a Motho yo ke wa me! 'It is how you to treat me or you'll have to treat me' - O êlê tlhôkô gore o tlaa mmôna kgotsa o tlaa mmôna O ne a se na go tshega, ka go tshega, a mo araba a re:
ty: " Nahea outou ia tape'a ia'na, te hoê o outou ? Nahea oe i te hi'o mata ia'na i te taime a opani ai au i te reira ? I muri, te parau atu nei au ia outou paatoa ! Na'u teie taata ! A ara i to oe huru i mua ia'na, e aore râ, e ti'a ia oe ia faaruru mai ia'u ". Ua fariu a'era te tamahine iti, ma te ata, ei pahonoraa ia'na:—
mai: "अहां ओकरा छूए के हिम्मत केना केलहुं, अहां मे सं कोनो? जखन हम मना कए देने छलहुं तखन अहां ओकरा पर नजरि रखबाक हिम्मत केना केलहुं? पाछू, हम अहां सभके कहैत छी! ई आदमी हमर अछि! सावधान रहू जे अहाँ ओकर संग कोना हस्तक्षेप करैत छी, नहि तऽ अहाँकेँ हमरासँ निपटय पड़त।" गोरी लड़की, रिबाल्ड कोक्वेट्रीक हँसीक संग ओकरा जवाब देबाक लेल मुड़लक:—
mg: "Ahoana no ahasahian'ialahy mikasi-tanana azy, na iza na iza aminareo? Ahoana no ahasahian'ny masonao azy, nefa izaho efa nandrara izany? Averiko indray, lazaiko aminareo rehetra!
